Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Salivaricin A (SalA, natural AMPs; lantibiotic, class 1 bacteriocin, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes;  UCSS1b; XXT3)

Literature Information.Literature: Discovery: adsorption to hydrophobic resin XAD-2 followed by methan-ol elution.Chemical modification: one lanthionine and two beta-methyllanthionine residues.Activity: active against most S. pyogenes strains and M. luteus. Updated 10/2023
Literature Information.Author: Ross KF, Ronson CW, Tagg JR1993
Literature Information.Reference: Appl Environ Microbiol. 1993 Jul;59(7):2014-21.Ross et al., 1993
Literature Information.Title: Isolation and characterization of the lantibiotic salivaricin A and its structural gene salA from Streptococcus salivarius 20P3
